attributes.action: Mandate COVID-19 vaccination for MP's and staff in the Houses of Parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
As our MP's have been elected to serve the public and they are also in public facing roles and realistically in contact with vulnerable members of the public they serve, it stands to reason that the covid 19 vaccination must also be mandated for them.
This should include any public facing roles within the Houses of Parliament and MP's offices.
attributes.background: The government have decided to mandate covid 19 vaccination for care workers and all public facing roles within NHS and social care.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593408
